quote: You clearly don’t know who you’re talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger. A guy opens his door and gets shot, and you think that of me? No! I am the one who knocks!
author: Walter White

quote: All the things that I did, you need to understand... I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. I was alive.
author: Walter White

quote: Some people are immune to good advice.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: Yeah, Mr. White! Yeah, science!
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: If you don’t know who I am, then maybe your best course would be to tread lightly.
author: Walter White

quote: Never do the same mistake twice.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: When I go in there, I’m bringing proof, not suspicion.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: It’s always been one step forward and two steps back
author: Walter White

quote: I don’t believe fear to be an effective motivator.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: Some straight like you, giant stick up his bum, age what, 60? He’s just gonna break bad?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: The thing is, if you just do stuff and nothing happens, what’s it all mean? What’s the point?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: If you’re committed enough, you can make any story work.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: What I came to realize is that fear, that’s the worst of it. That’s the real enemy. So, get up, get out in the real world and you kick that bastard as hard you can right in the teeth.
author: Walter White

quote: Just because you shot Jesse James, don’t make you Jesse James.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: Say my name.
author: Walter White

quote: Is this just a genetic thing with you? Is it congenital? Did your mother drop you on your head when you were a baby?
author: Walter White

quote: Hey, I’m a civilian! I’m not your lawyer anymore. I’m nobody’s lawyer.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: Sometimes the forbidden fruit tastes the sweetest.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: Free food always tastes good. Free drinks even better.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: Screw you and your eyebrows.
author: Walter White

quote: You need to stop focusing on the darkness behind you. The past is the past. Nothing can change what we’ve done.
author: Walter White

quote: Finding myself awake at three in the morning. But you know what? Ever since my diagnosis, I sleep just fine.
author: Walter White

quote: You know what Walt? Someone needs to protect this family from the man who protects this family.
author: Skyler White

quote: The devil is in the details.
author: Skyler White

quote: It’s easy money. Until we catch you.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: I once told a woman I was Kevin Costner and it worked because I believed it.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: If you believe that there’s a hell, we’re pretty much already going there.
author: Walter White

quote: You’re the smartest guy I’ve ever met. And you’re too stupid to see… He made up his mind ten minutes ago.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: The fun’s over. From here on out, I’m Mr. Low Profile. Just another douche bag with a job and three pairs of Dockers. If I’m lucky, month from now, best-case scenario, I’m managing a Cinnabon in Omaha.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: We tried to poison you. We tried to poison you because you are an insane, degenerate piece of filth and you deserve to die.
author: Walter White

quote: I am speaking to my family now. Skyler, you are the love of my life. I hope you know that.
author: Walter White

quote: I won.
author: Walter White

quote: The moral of the story is… I chose a half measure when I should have gone all the way. I’ll never make that mistake again. No more half measures, Walter.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: And a man, a man provides. And he does it even when he’s not appreciated, or respected, or even loved. He simply bears up and he does it. Because he’s a man.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: I watched Jane die. I was there. And I watched her die. I watched her overdose and choke to death. I could have saved her. But I didn’t.
author: Walter White

quote: I have lived under the threat of death for a year now. And because of that, I’ve made choices.
author: Walter White

quote: Darth Vader had responsibilities. He was responsible for the Death Star.
author: Badger

quote: I’m a blowfish! Blowfish! Yeah! Blowfishin’ this up!
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Shut the hell up and let me die in peace
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: Why should we do anything more than once? Should I just smoke this one cigarette? Maybe we should only make love once if it’s the same thing? Should we just watch one sunset? Or live just one day? Because it’s new every time. Each time is a new experience.
author: Jane Margolis

quote: You are a time bomb tick, tick, ticking. And I have no intention of being around for the boom.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: I have spent my whole life scared, frightened of things that could happen, might happen, might not happen, fifty years I spent like that.
author: Walter White

quote: I told you, Skyler, I warned you for a solid year: you cross me, and there will be consequences.
author: Walter White

quote: There is more money here than we could spend in 10 lifetimes. Please tell me: how much is enough? How big does this pile have to be?
author: Skyler White

quote: If I have to hear one more time that you did this for the family…
author: Skyler White

quote: Scientists love lasers.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: You add plus a douchebag to a minus douchebag and you get, like, zero douchebags.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: A guy that clean has to be dirty.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: There is gold in the streets just waiting for someone to come and scoop it up.
author: Walter White

quote: I’m not saying it’s not bad. It’s bad. But it could be worse.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: We’re done when I say we’re done
author: Walter White

quote: Did you know that there’s an acceptable level of rat turds that can go into candy bars?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Tagging trees is a lot better than chasing monsters.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: I hide in plain sight, same as you.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: I mean, it’s just... It’s the constant, it’s the cycle. Its solution, dissolution, just over and over and over. It is growth, then decay, then transformation. It is fascinating, really.
author: Walter White

quote: I’m in the empire business.
author: Walter White

quote: My friends, I promise you that together, we will prosper.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: We’re all on the same page. The one that says, if I can’t kill you, you’ll sure as hell wish you were dead.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: This is my own private domicile and I will not be harassed!
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Well, technically, chemistry is the study of matter. But I prefer to see it as the study of change.
author: Walter White

quote: Who are you talking to right now? Who is it you think you see? Do you know how much I make a year?
author: Walter White

quote: We’ve come this far… What’s one more?
author: Skyler White

quote: Congratulations, you’ve just left your family a second-hand Subaru.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: Even government doesn’t care that much about quality. You know what is okay to put in hot dogs?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Oh, hey, nerdiest old dude I know, you wanna come cook crystal? Please. I’d ask my diaper-wearing granny, but her wheelchair wouldn’t fit in the RV.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Oh, no. I don’t want to hear about the police! I do not say that lightly!
author: Walter White

quote: I learned from the best. Something tells me Hank is here because of yo
author: and I’m not forgetting that.”

quote: When I put everything into quicken, nothing flashed red, so that’s gotta mean it’s ok, right?
author: Skyler White

quote: Stay out of my territory.
author: Walter White

quote: This is what comes from blood for blood.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: What do I look like? Scarface?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Coin flip is sacred.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: To all law enforcement entities, this is not an admission of guilt.
author: Walter White

quote: Did I say you could open your mouth? And, hands off the car!
author: Hank Schrader

quote: I need support. Me, the almost 40-year-old pregnant woman with a surprise baby on the way. And the husband with lung cancer who disappears for hours on end, and I don’t know where he goes and he barely even speaks to me anymore.
author: Skyler White

quote: I swear to Christ, I will put you under the jail!
author: Hank Schrader

quote: You are not the guy. You’re not capable of being the guy. I had a guy, but now I don’t. You are not the guy.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: We have discussed everything we need to discuss… I thought I made myself clear…
author: Skyler White

quote: Walt, please, let’s both of us stop trying to justify this whole thing and admit you’re in danger!
author: Skyler White

quote: Walter Jr., you’re my big man. There are going to be some things that you’ll come to learn about me in the next few days. But just know that no matter how it may look, I only had you in my heart. Goodbye.
author: Walter White

quote: Cause God knows she’s the one with the really important problems!
author: Skyler White

quote: When you have children, you always have family.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: You really want to burn him down? Let’s do it together.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: You got me riding shotgun to every dark recess of this state. It’d be nice if you clued me in a little.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: If you try to interfere, this becomes a much simpler matter.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: Sending him on a trip to Belize.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: You don’t have to make up with me. We don’t have to understand each other. Things are fine the way they are.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: My brother is not a bad person. He has a good heart. It’s just he can’t help himself. And everyone’s left picking up the pieces.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: Hey, you and Mozart, huh? You both started young.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: Here’s what’s gonna happen. One day you’re gonna get sick – again. One of your employees is gonna find you curled up in that space blanket, take you to the hospital, hook you up to those machines that beep and whir, and hurt. And this time, it will be too much. And you will die there. Alone.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: You pulled that heartstrings con job on me?! You piece of shit! ‘Oh, my brain used to work, I’m sick, I don’t know what to do!’ Asshole! No wonder Rebecca left you! What took her so long?!
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: For ten minutes today, Chuck didn’t hate me. I forgot what that felt like.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: My friends, I promise you that together, we will prosper.
author: Gus Fring

quote: Getting arrested that makes people look guilty, even the innocent ones and innocent people get arrested every day.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: I guess I shouldn’t be surprised I have to tell you this. But it’s probably a bad idea that you willingly talk to the police, being a criminal and all.
author: Mike Erhmantraut

quote: What’s the difference between a tick and a lawyer? The tick falls off when you’re dead!
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: I don’t know what image you have of him, past or present, or whatever he did or said, but Jimmy is a good lawyer. And he works very hard.
author: Kim Wexler

quote: Confidence is good. Facts on your side, better.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: We can we all three just parachute down from cloud cuckoo land?
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: The bar exam’s a mother. I mean, for me it was. I failed it the first two times, but I guess it’s like losing your virginity, third time’s the charm.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: No crime is complete without the cover-up.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: A good magician never reveals his secrets.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: I know we’re never supposed to say our clients are guilty, but, hey, not my client anymore. He’s guilty as sin.
author: Kim Wexler

quote: Either you fit the jacket, or the jacket fits you.
author: Kim Wexler

quote: You think I’m trouble now, as your partner? Imagine me as your enemy.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: This is an opportunity. That’s why I’m doing this, not to punish you. To show you – truly show you – that you have to make a change before it’s too late. Before you destroy yourself, or someone else. And I believe you can change. You’ll find your path. And when you’re ready, I will be there to help you walk that path.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: I don’t doubt that your emotions are real. But what’s the point of all the sad faces and the gnashing of teeth? If you’re not going to change your behavior…
author: Chuck McGill

quote: I know what stopped me. And you know what? It’s never stopping me again.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: Facts are facts.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: What do you call a lawyer with an IQ of 60? Your Honor.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: Perfection is the enemy of perfectly adequate.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: Winning doesn’t always mean ‘getting a favorable verdict at trial.
author: Kim Wexler

quote: It’s never too late for congratulations.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: Look at you. You’re in so much pain. Why are you putting yourself through all this?
author: Chuck McGill

quote: Sometimes the good guys win.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: I’m not good at building shit, you know? I’m excellent at tearing it down.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: The fallacy of sunk cost… It’s what gamblers do. They throw good money after bad thinking they can turn their luck around. It’s like, ‘I’ve already spent this much money or time… whatever. I got to keep going!’ No, there’s no reward at the end of this game.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: This is what you do. You hurt people over and over and over, and then there’s this show of remorse.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: Whoa, whoa. Hold up. What the hell happened to you? I get it, the first rule of Fight Club, right?
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: What do you get when you cross the Godfather with a lawyer? An offer you can’t understand.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: Got to look successful to be successful.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: Promise me you won’t do anything stupid. Promise me.
author: Nacho Varga

quote: Are you telling the truth? Or are you just trying to make me feel better?
author: Chuck McGill

quote: Money is not beside the point… Money is the point.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: The price of excellence is eternal vigilance.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: Wow, my knight in shining armor. That is some sacrifice, quitting a job that you’ve been trying to tank since day one.
author: Kim Wexler

quote: The lesson is, if you’re gonna be a criminal, do your homework.
author: Mike Erhmantraut

quote: I pretend not to care, but he’s my brother. How can I not?
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: Why do they bury lawyers under 20 feet of dirt? Because deep down, they’re really good people.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: If I had to do it all over again, I would maybe do some things differently. I just thought you should know that.
author: Jimmy McGill

quote: I don’t want to hurt your feelings. But the truth is, you’ve never mattered all that much to me.
author: Chuck McGill

quote: I love what you’ve done with the place. Last time I was here, it was, uh… Well, not a contender for the cover of Good Housekeeping, that’s for sure.
author: Jimmy McGill
